Hello,

Is there currently a way to invert the Y axis, so that the origin(0, 0) matches the WPF screen coordinate system (Top left)?

Thanks

Hello,

To invert Y axis, use the following code:

 

plotter.DataTransform = new LambdaDataTransform(p => new Point(p.X, -p.Y), p => new Point(p.X, -p.Y));

and then set up visible area as you want.

Best regards,

Mikhail.
